backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping product‑related frontend files to implemented requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend components, styles, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing header, hero, product grid, contact section, footer, and product detail dialog state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying address, phone, and email inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with headline, tagline, and button that scrolls to the product section.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product’s image and name with a button to open details.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailsDi: Modal dialog showing a product’s large image and description.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of product cards from the product list.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and the six cake and cookie product entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm bakery-themed light/dark color palette using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom bakery-themed colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and state for the cake shop website.
